00035     Alignment MultipleAlignmentFactory::GotohalignMultiple(
00036         const bpp::VectorSequenceContainer* input, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00037         bool verbose)
00038       {
00039 
00040         Alignment out(input->getAlphabet());
00041 
00042 #ifdef _OPENMP            
00043 #pragma omp parallel for
00044 #endif    
00045         for (uint u=0; u<input->getNumberOfSequences(); u++)
00046           {
00047 
00048             for (uint k=u+1; k<input->getNumberOfSequences(); k++)
00049               {
00050                 if (verbose)
00051                   std::cout << "*" << std::flush;
00052                 Alignment temp = GotohAlignment(input->getSequence(u),
00053                     input->getSequence(k), scoreM, verbose);
00054                 out.addSequence(temp.getSequence(0));
00055                 out.addSequence(temp.getSequence(1));
00056               }
00057             if (verbose)
00058               std::cout << std::endl;
00059 
00060           }
00061         return out;
00062 
00063       }
00064     Alignment MultipleAlignmentFactory::NMWalignMultiple(
00065         const bpp::VectorSequenceContainer* input, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00066         bool verbose)
00067       {
00068         Alignment out(input->getAlphabet());
00069 
00070 #ifdef _OPENMP            
00071 #pragma omp parallel for
00072 #endif    
00073         for (uint u=0; u<input->getNumberOfSequences(); u++)
00074           {
00075 
00076             for (uint k=u+1; k<input->getNumberOfSequences(); k++)
00077               {
00078                 if (verbose)
00079                   std::cout << "*" << std::flush;
00080                 Alignment temp = NeedlemanWunschAlignment(
00081                     input->getSequence(u), input->getSequence(k), scoreM);
00082 
00083                 out.addSequence(temp.getSequence(0));
00084                 out.addSequence(temp.getSequence(1));
00085               }
00086             if (verbose)
00087               std::cout << std::endl;
00088 
00089           }
00090         return out;
00091 
00092       }
